search.query: (index=route_stats OR (index=siri lat!=0 $planned_start_time$)) agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ earliest=$earliest$ latest=$latest$ date=$date$ | fields time_recorded planned_start_time lat lon start_stop_lat start_stop_lon _time sourcetype
index="route_stats" date=$date$ | fields agency_id agency_name route_short_name date all_stop_desc_city all_stop_name all_stop_code route_id route_mkt route_direction

eventstats first(start_stop_lat) as start_stop_lat first(start_stop_lon) as start_stop_lon | stats count by time_recorded planned_start_time lat lon start_stop_lat start_stop_lon | eval start_latlon = start_stop_lat.",".start_stop_lon | eval latlon = lat.",".lon | haversine originField=start_latlon latlon | table planned_start_time time_recorded distance | streamstats min(distance) as min_dist | head 20 | sort min_dist time_recorded | where distance>0.2 and distance>=min_dist | head 1 | table planned_start_time time_recorded | convert dur2sec(planned_start_time) AS sts dur2sec(time_recorded) AS trs | eval td=trs-sts | eval late=tostring(td, "duration") | eval late=case(td>0, "Late by ".late, td<0, "Early by ".late, td==0, "Right on time!") | table planned_start_time time_recorded late td

sort sourcetype _time | eval latitude = coalesce(lat, start_stop_lat), longitude = coalesce(lon, start_stop_lon), tooltip=if(isnull(time_recorded), "Start Stop", time_recorded) | eval planned_start_time=coalesce(planned_start_time, start_time) | eval icon=case(sourcetype=="siri_csv", "bus", sourcetype=="route_stats", "home") | dedup tooltip planned_start_time | eval markerColor = if(sourcetype=="siri_csv", "blue", "red") | eval clusterGroup = sourcetype | streamstats first(latitude) as prev_lat first(longitude) as prev_lon window=1 current=false by planned_start_time | eval prev_latlon = prev_lat.",".prev_lon | eval latlon = latitude.",".longitude | eval prev_latlon = coalesce(prev_latlon, latlon) | haversine originField=prev_latlon latlon | convert dur2sec(time_recorded) as time_recorded_secs | delta time_recorded_secs as delta_time | eval speed = distance/(delta_time/3600)
| tstats count where index=siri by date | eval earliest = strptime(date, "%Y-%m-%d") | eval date_wday = date.", ".strftime(earliest, "%a") | sort - date

search agency_id=$agency_id$ $start_stop_city$ $end_stop_city$ | makemv delim=";" all_stop_desc_city | eval reg=if(like($start_stop_city$, "%*%"), ".*", $start_stop_city$) | eval find=if(like($start_stop_city$, "%*%"), 0, mvfind(all_stop_desc_city, reg)) | eval filt_city=mvindex(all_stop_desc_city, find, -1) | eval reg=if(like($end_stop_city$, "%*%"), ".*", $end_stop_city$) | eval find=if(like($end_stop_city$, "%*%"), 0, mvfind(filt_city, reg)) | where isnotnull(find) | stats count values(route_id) as route_id by route_short_name
search agency_id=$agency_id$ route_short_name=$route_short_name$ | makemv delim=";" all_stop_desc_city | stats count by all_stop_desc_city

search agency_id=$agency_id$ route_short_name=$route_short_name$ $start_stop_city$ | makemv delim=";" all_stop_desc_city | eval reg=if(like($start_stop_city$, "%*%"), ".*", $start_stop_city$) | eval find=if(like($start_stop_city$, "%*%"), 0, mvfind(all_stop_desc_city, reg)) | eval filt_city=mvindex(all_stop_desc_city, find, -1) | stats count by filt_city
search route_short_name=$route_short_name$ $start_stop_city$ $end_stop_city$ | stats sum(num_trips) as count by agency_name agency_id | eval desc = agency_name." (".agency_id.")" | sort -count

search agency_id=$agency_id$ $start_stop_city$ $end_stop_city$ $route_id$ | makemv delim=";" all_stop_code | makemv delim=";" all_stop_name | makemv delim=";" all_stop_desc_city | eval all=mvzip(all_stop_code, all_stop_name, "~") | eval all=mvzip(all, all_stop_desc_city, "~") | mvexpand all | eval stop_city=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 2) | where stop_city=$start_stop_city$ | eval stop_code=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 0) | eval stop_name=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 1) | dedup stop_name | table stop_name, stop_code, stop_city

search agency_id=$agency_id$ $start_stop_city$ $end_stop_city$ $route_id$ | makemv delim=";" all_stop_code | makemv delim=";" all_stop_name | makemv delim=";" all_stop_desc_city | eval all=mvzip(all_stop_code, all_stop_name, "~") | eval all=mvzip(all, all_stop_desc_city, "~") | mvexpand all | eval stop_city=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 2) | where stop_city=$end_stop_city$ | eval stop_code=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 0) | eval stop_name=mvindex(split(all, "~"), 1) | dedup stop_name | table stop_name, stop_code, stop_city

| tstats dc(time_recorded) as points count where index=siri lat!=0 date=$date$ agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ by planned_start_time index | append [search index=route_stats date=$date$ agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ | makemv delim=";" all_start_time | stats count by index all_start_time | rename all_start_time as planned_start_time | eval index="gtfs"] | stats first(points) as points dc(index) as index_dc first(index) as index by planned_start_time | eval desc = if(index_dc==2, planned_start_time." - ".points, planned_start_time." (".index.") - ".points)

search index=route_stats date=$date$ route_short_name=$route_short_name$ agency_id=$agency_id$ $start_stop_city$ $end_stop_city$ $route_id$ all_stop_name="*$orig_stop$*$dest_stop$*" | stats count by route_mkt route_direction | stats count values(route_mkt) as route_mkt

html.p: date=$date$ route_short_name=$route_short_name$ route_mkt=$route_mkt$ agency_id=$agency_id$ orig_city=$start_stop_city$ dest_city=$end_stop_city$ orig_stop="$orig_stop$" dest_stop="$dest_stop$"

search.query: stats count as distinct_points sum(distance) as total_distance min(time_recorded_secs) as min_time max(time_recorded_secs) as max_time max(speed) as max_speed | eval total_time = max_time-min_time, avg_speed = round(total_distance / (total_time/3600), 2)." km/h" | eval duration=tostring(total_time, "duration")." hrs", total_distance = round(total_distance, 2)." km", max_speed = round(max_speed, 2)." km/h"| fields - min_time max_time total_time | append [search index=route_stats $route_id$ earliest=$earliest$ latest=$latest$ date=$date$ | eval duration=tostring(round(mean_trip_duration*3600), "duration")." hrs", total_distance = round(mean_trip_distance/1000, 2)." km", avg_speed=round(service_speed, 2)." km/h" | table duration, total_distance, avg_speed] | transpose | rename "row 1" as siri "row 2" as gtfs
eval "late by (minutes)" = td/60 | rename time_recorded as "~actual_start_time" | table planned_start_time, "~actual_start_time" "late by (minutes)"

((index=siri lat!=0 $planned_start_time$)) agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ earliest=$earliest$ latest=$latest$ date=$date$ date_hour>=$hour_min$ date_hour<=$hour_max$ | convert dur2sec(time_recorded) as time_recorded_secs | sort sourcetype time_recorded_secs | eval latitude = coalesce(lat, start_stop_lat), longitude = coalesce(lon, start_stop_lon) | eval tooltip=time_recorded | eval planned_start_time=coalesce(planned_start_time, start_time) | eval icon="bus" | eval trip_temp_id = planned_start_time.", bus ".coalesce(bus_id,"UNK").", route_id=".coalesce(route_id, "UNK") | eval pathLayer = trip_temp_id | eval layerDescription = trip_temp_id | eval layerGroup = trip_temp_id | dedup tooltip trip_temp_id | eval markerColor = "blue" | streamstats first(latitude) as prev_lat first(longitude) as prev_lon window=1 current=false by planned_start_time | eval prev_latlon = prev_lat.",".prev_lon | eval latlon = latitude.",".longitude | eval prev_latlon = coalesce(prev_latlon, latlon) | haversine originField=prev_latlon latlon | delta time_recorded_secs as delta_time | eval speed = distance/(delta_time/3600) | eval playback = "true" | eval description="
time_recordedbus_idtime delta (sec)speed (kmh)
".time_recorded."".bus_id."".delta_time."".speed."
" | eval cluterGroup="bus_location" | append [search index=route_stats agency_id=$agency_id$ $route_id$ earliest=$earliest$ latest=$latest$ date=$date$ | eval all_stop_latlon="XX".all_stop_latlon."XX" | makemv delim=";" all_stop_latlon | makemv delim=";" all_stop_code | makemv delim=";" all_stop_name | eval all=mvzip(all_stop_latlon, all_stop_code, "|") | eval all=mvzip(all, all_stop_name, " - ")| mvexpand all | rex field=all "(?.*)\|(?.*)" | eval icon=case(like(all_stop_latlon, "XX%"), "home", like(all_stop_latlon, "%XX"), "bed", 1==1, "stop-circle") | eval layerDescription=case(like(all_stop_latlon, "XX%"), "First stop", like(all_stop_latlon, "%XX"), "Last Stop", 1==1, "Stop") | rex field=all_stop_latlon "(?[\d\.]*),(?[\d\.]*)(XX)?" | eval description=stop_code | eval markerColor=case(like(all_stop_latlon, "XX%"), "green", like(all_stop_latlon, "%XX"), "red", 1==1, "orange") | eval clusterGroup=layerDescription | eval trip_temp_id = "Stops path" | eval pathWeight=1 | eval pathColor = "#e41a1c" | eval pathLayer = "Stops path" | eval playback = "false" | table latitude, longitude, description, icon, clusterGroup, markerColor, trip_temp_id, layerDescription, pathWeight pathColor, pathLayer, playback] | table latitude longitude tooltip icon markerColor clusterGroup _time description planned_start_time trip_temp_id layerDescription, pathWeight pathColor pathLayer layerGroup bus_id date agency_id playback

index=route_stats $route_id$ earliest=$earliest$ latest=$latest$ date=$date$ | eval mean_trip_duration=tostring(round(mean_trip_duration*3600), "duration")." hrs", mean_trip_distance = round(mean_trip_distance/1000, 2)." km", service_speed=round(service_speed, 2)." km/h" | table agency_name route_short_name start_zone end_zone num_zones num_zones_missing route_id route_mkt route_alternative is_loop route_direction mean_trip_duration mean_trip_distance service_speed num_trips start_time end_time num_stops start_stop_city start_stop_name end_stop_city end_stop_name all_start_time all_stop_code | append [ | stats count | fields - count | eval agency_name=1, route_short_name=2, start_zone=3, end_zone=4, num_zones=5, num_zones_missing=6, route_id=6.5, route_mkt=7, route_alternative=8, is_loop=9, route_direction=10, mean_trip_duration=10.4, mean_trip_distance=10.6, service_speed=10.7, num_trips=11, start_time=12, end_time=13, num_stops=14, start_stop_city=14.5, start_stop_name=15, end_stop_name=16, end_stop_city=15.5, all_start_time=17, all_stop_code=18] | sort agency_name | transpose | sort "row 1" | fields - "row 1" | rename "row *" as route_* | rename route_2 as route_1 | rename route_3 as route_2 | rename route_4 as route_3 | rename route_5 as route_4 | rename route_6 as route_5 | rename route_7 as route_6
